document.full_text: labor leaders say plans to commemorate the 125th anniversary of the haymarket affair in chicago are uniting present-day union members fighting efforts by lawmakers to limit collective bargaining by public workers.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: passion of haymarket affair resonates 125 years later
lines_and_colors: labor leaders say plans to commemorate the 125th anniversary of the haymarket affair in chicago are uniting present-day union members fighting efforts by lawmakers to limit collective bargaining by public workers.
